member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Kyber.MontgomeryReduce(System.Int32)
member.summary: Montgomery reduction; given a 32-bit integer , computes 16-bit integer congruent to a * R^-1 mod q, where R=2^16
member.returns: integer in {-q+1,...,q-1} congruent to a * R^-1 modulo q.

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Kyber.BarrettReduce(System.Int16)
member.summary: Barrett reduction; given a 16-bit integer , computes 16-bit integer congruent to a mod q in {0,...,q}
member.returns: integer in {0,...,q} congruent to a modulo q.

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Kyber.ConditionalSubtract(System.Int16)
member.summary: Conditionallly subtract q
member.returns: a - q if a >= q, else a

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Polynomial.CBD2(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Given an array of uniformly random bytes, compute polynomial with coefficients distributed according to a centered binomial distribution with parameter eta=2.

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Polynomial.CBD3(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Given an array of uniformly random bytes, compute polynomial with coefficients distributed according to a centered binomial distribution with parameter eta=3. This function is only needed for Kyber-512

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Polynomial.PolyNTT
member.summary: Computes negacyclic number-theoretic transform (NTT) of a polynomial in place. Inputs assumed to be in normal order, output in bitreversed order

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.PQC.Polynomial.PolyInvNTT
member.summary: Computes negacyclic number-theoretic transform (NTT) of a polynomial in place. Inputs assumed to be in bitreversed order, output in normal order
